home.title: Jarno Wieman

bio.description: I am a software developer with a passion for creating and learning new things. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities. Besides that I love cats, choccy milk, mountainbiking, music and playing video games. Feel free to look around and see what I am capable of or check out my socials to see what else I get up to.
